overview:
Graham Barnet is co-founder and Chief Executive Officer of Sigma. As Chief Executive Officer he sits on the boards of both Sigma Capital Group plc and Sigma Technology Management Limited and is responsible for the management of the Group through the development of objectives, strategy and standards of performance. Graham is also a Co-Founder and Managing Director of Sigma’s property activities through its subsiduary Strategic Investment Management Limited

Prior to founding Sigma, Graham had his own company, Merchant Investments Limited, which was a specialist consultancy involved in the management of businesses both in the traditional and technology sectors.

Graham has been involved in technology investment for almost 20 years and leads the investment committee. Graham also leads Sigma’s funds activity.
